resources.string: Well, dinosaurs is always under eye of government but above eyes of public.
I watch the birth and death of kings

I last beyond all living things
 I am the oldest in the land
 I am the greatest boulder, the finest sand
 I stand above the Penang 
 Up, up it goes and yet never grows?

I once killed the Thunder God, although I was fallen with him.
 My brother consumed the greatest god, while my sister was the ruler of hell.
 I left my posterity under this cruel world, living in the shrine, while they never grows. 
 The shrine...the shrine......

I am once the barrier from enemy 
 Defending from the assault 
 Even I was retired long time ago 
 But I never ever forget to deliver the art of fight for my land
 With every part of my body.
